response.summary:
Chemical Engineer from the “Universidad Nacional de Colombia” with a master’s degree in Sciences with Specialty in Energy Engineering from the “Instituto Tecnológico de Estudios Superiores de Monterrey”.
Experience in the development of projects hand in hand with the client, complying with negotiation stages and estimation of costs and man hours, change orders and complementary work. Experience in the Oil & Gas sector as Process Engineer. Specialist in CFD, with great experience in energy optimization of processes. Experience as a research assistant in the ITESM group on energy and climate change.
Development of deliverables, planning of activities, team work, coordination of personnel and activities for the execution of engineering works with offices abroad. Performance of pre-commissioning and commissioning of plants in the Oil & Gas sector.
response.skills: Gestión de la calidad, Gasoductos, Estaciones de bombeo, FEED, HAZOP, Energy Industry, P&ID, Aspen HYSYS, Petrochemical, Refinery, EPC, Oil/Gas, Petroleum, Gas, Chemical Engineering, Project Engineering, Process Simulation, Upstream, Commissioning, Onshore

profile_positions.description: Develop research projects for the benefit of interested and sponsoring companies, so that mutual benefit is obtained for the industry and the academic sector.
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant in the Research Group on Energy and Climate Change

profile_positions.description: Process engineer in the design of equipment for the hydrocarbon industry and the food industry, responsible for the calculation, design and development of engineering deliverables; as well as the estimation of costs of products and services, under the current economic scheme aimed at maximizing customer satisfaction and the company's profit.
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Process engineer responsible for the design of plants in the Oil & Gas sector, developing projects of great national and international level. Leader of some projects, part of the team in other of them, focused on results and maximizing the occupation of the collaborators in the different tasks assigned.

Functions

- Project Control.
- Documents Control.
- Estimation of man hours for project proposals.
- Coordination of the Design team for the execution of plans.
- Creation and update of engineering deliverables such as PFD's, P & ID's, list of lines, Tie-In points lists, simulations in stable state among others.
- Planning of calculation memories for the dimensioning of equipment and accessories for the Oil & Gas industry.
- Hydraulic studies and evaluation of alternatives in existing and new plants.
- HAZOP.
- Survey of information in the field.
- Constructibility workshop.
- Feasibility studies, use of resources, minimization of expenses and optimal operation. Calculations for the improvement of the process.
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer

education.degree_name: Master of Science with an emphasis in Energy Engineering

company.name: SERINGTEC S.A.S.
company.description:
Somos una Empresa que presta servicios de Consultoría, estudios, diseños e Interventoría de proyectos de ingeniería a nivel nacional e internacional; suministro, instalación y mantenimiento de infraestructura industrial, con personal competente en la ejecución de actividades encaminadas a brindar un servicio con altos estándares de Calidad, Responsabilidad Social,  Ambiental, Eficiencia y Cumplimiento.

PORTAFOLIO DE SERVICIOS:

- Piping

- Proceso

- Operaciones

- Civil

- Mecánica 

- Instrumentación y Control

- Telecomunicaciones

- Gestión y Control de Proyectos

- HSE

location.address: Calle 11 # 4 – 39 Centro Comercial LECS, Locales 137 y 138 Barrio Centro
